items.title: Detection Field Assessment
items.description: Detection rules will now automatically have all the fields required for the detection to fire assessed during the rule assessment phase. Any detection with fields that do not exist will be tagged with warnings showing fields are missing and what fields are missing

items.title: Users
items.description: - Users were not assigned their role correctly on creation.

items.title: Permissions
items.description: - Several default permissions were missing during upgrade that prevented users from accessing certain areas of the system.
